content:
A mixture of bib (0.044 g, 0.2 mmol), H2atibdc (0.120 g, 0.2 mmol), and Co­(Ac)2·4H2O (0.051 g, 0.2 mmol) in N,N-dimethylformamide (DMF, 8 mL) and distilled water (2 mL) was placed in a Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel (25 mL) and heated at 80 °C for 3 days and slowly cooled to room temperature (5 °C h–1). Dark blue block crystals of 1 were isolated by washing with DMF and H2O, and dried in air. The yield was 80.56% based on Co. Anal. Elemental analysis: calc. for C20H20CoI3N5O4: C, 28.80; H, 2.42; N, 8.40; found: C, 28.89; H, 2.33; N, 8.31. IR date (KBr, cm–1): 3413m, 3330m, 3124m, 2909w, 1604s, 1507w, 1397m, 1326s, 1283w, 1253m, 1154m, 1007m, 932m,778w, 736s, 676m, 627w, 556m, 493m.

Synthesis of [Co­(bib)­(atibdc)]­·2H<sub>2</sub>O (<bold>2</bold>, <bold>2M</bold>, and <bold>2P</bold>)

The procedure was the same as with 1, except that the temperature was raised to 130 °C. Dark blue block crystals of 2M and 2P were isolated by washing with DMF and H2O, and dried in air. The yield was 70.21% based on Co. Anal. Elemental analysis: calc. for C20H24CoI3N5O6: C, 27.61; H, 2.78; N, 8.05; found: C, 27.55; H, 2.91; N, 8.14. IR date (KBr, cm–1): 3431m, 3127w, 2910m, 2025m, 1604s, 1505m, 1507m, 1397s, 1326s, 1283w, 1253m, 1154m, 1008m, 932m, 778m, 736m, 676m, 627m, 568m, 493m.

Synthesis of [Co­(bib)­(aipa)] (<bold>3</bold>)

The method was as described above for 1 and 2, except that the temperature was raised to 150 °C. Purple block crystals of 3 were collected, washed with DMF and H2O, and dried in air. The yield was 79.60% based on Co. Anal. Elemental analysis: calc. for C20H23CoN5O4: C, 52.64; H, 5.08; N, 15.35; found: C, 52.78; H, 4.90; N, 15.22. IR date (KBr, cm–1): 3455m, 3376m, 3126m, 2936m, 2299w, 2025w, 1617s, 1459s, 1340m, 1277m, 1123s, 1002s, 909m, 887m, 759s, 621w, 476w.

Synthesis of [Co(bib)(atibdc)] (1)

A mixture of bib (0.044 g, 0.2 mmol), H2atibdc (0.120 g, 0.2 mmol), and Co(Ac)2⋅4H2O (0.051 g, 0.2 mmol) in N,N-dimethylformamide (DMF, 8 mL) and distilled water (2 mL) was placed in a Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel (25 mL) and heated at 80 °C for 3 days and slowly cooled to room temperature (5 °C h-1). Dark blue block crystals of 1 were isolated by washing with DMF and H2O, and dried in air. The yield was 80.56% based on Co. Anal. Elemental analysis: calc. for C20H20CoI3N5O4: C, 28.80; H, 2.42; N, 8.40; found: C, 28.89; H, 2.33; N, 8.31. IR date (KBr, cm-1): 3413m, 3330m, 3124m, 2909w, 1604s, 1507w, 1397m, 1326s, 1283w, 1253m, 1154m, 1007m, 932m,778w, 736s, 676m, 627w, 556m, 493m.

Synthesis of [Co(bib)(atibdc)]⋅2H2O (2, 2M, and 2P)

The procedure was the same as with 1, except that the temperature was raised to 130 °C. Dark blue block crystals of 2M and 2P were isolated by washing with DMF and H2O, and dried in air. The yield was 70.21% based on Co. Anal. Elemental analysis: calc. for C20H24CoI3N5O6: C, 27.61; H, 2.78; N, 8.05; found: C, 27.55; H, 2.91; N, 8.14. IR date (KBr, cm-1): 3431m, 3127w, 2910m, 2025m, 1604s, 1505m, 1507m, 1397s, 1326s, 1283w, 1253m, 1154m, 1008m, 932m, 778m, 736m, 676m, 627m, 568m, 493m.

Synthesis of [Co(bib)(aipa)] (3)

The method was as described above for 1 and 2, except that the temperature was raised to 150 °C. Purple block crystals of 3 were collected, washed with DMF and H2O, and dried in air. The yield was 79.60% based on Co. Anal. Elemental analysis: calc. for C20H23CoN5O4: C, 52.64; H, 5.08; N, 15.35; found: C, 52.78; H, 4.90; N, 15.22. IR date (KBr, cm-1): 3455m, 3376m, 3126m, 2936m, 2299w, 2025w, 1617s, 1459s, 1340m, 1277m, 1123s, 1002s, 909m, 887m, 759s, 621w, 476w.
